title: About Me
lines: I graduated from the Software Engineering Foundations program at Holberton School Uruguay in 2022, some time before OpenAI released ChatGPT to the public; the first globally known AI chatbot. The previous year, Github Copilot was already making fame as the first AI pair programmer.
Even though these tools boost productivity in several work fields, as a tech industry professional it is important to understand the building blocks of all things.
That's why today, with almost three years of experience, I am a full-stack developer driven by passion and dedication to my work.
